moreBlocks.lawyersAtPeterThompson&AssociatesSelecte: • Thompson, Peter On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Voted Lewiston’s “Best Personal Injury Lawyers” for 2017.

Advocating on behalf of those in need in Androscoggin County and the surrounding areas from our law office in Lewiston, Maine, the attorneys at Peter Thompson & Associates are here to help you obtain the justice you seek following an injury or loss caused by someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

With six law offices throughout the state, we are one of the region's largest personal injury practices. We have consistently obtained outstanding results for our clients, recovering over $15,000,000 in settlements and awards last year alone. The results we have achieved earned our firm U.S. World & News Report’s "Best Law Firms" rating. Our attorneys have over 60 years combined experience, have won over 100 jury trials, and have received numerous awards including U.S. World & News Report’s recognition that we are among the "Best Lawyers in America.”

Totally Devoted To Your Needs

At Peter Thompson & Associates, client satisfaction is our most important objective. In surveys completed by our clients, we were rated 4.9 out of 5 stars for “communication”, “responsiveness” and “overall satisfaction”, with 100% stating they “would recommend” our firm to others. We understand the difficulties that our clients experience after an accident and work hard to lift that weight off their shoulders so they can focus on getting better and back on their feet. There are many ways we help our clients, from assisting clients in obtaining disability benefits or payment for medical expenses, to simply answering questions and providing advice about how to best resolve problems that arise.

If you or a loved one has been seriously injured in an accident, contact Peter Thompson & Associates to protect your rights and interests and help you obtain the compensation you need and deserve.
